faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 2 BHK flat for sale in Dayal Bagh Colony

faqs.question: Is Dayal Bagh Colony considered a safe locality for families and senior citizens
faqs.answer: Dayal Bagh Colony has a strong reputation as a safe and predominantly residential area in Faridabad. The local police patrolling is regular, contributing to the overall sense of security, making it highly suitable for both families and elderly residents seeking a peaceful living environment.

faqs.question: What is the average size or carpet area of 2 BHK flats available here
faqs.answer: The average super built-up area for a 2 BHK flat for sale in Dayal Bagh Colony generally ranges from 750 square feet to 1100 square feet. The actual carpet area, which is the space enclosed within the walls, usually falls between 600 square feet and 850 square feet. It is essential to confirm the carpet area versus the super built-up area when viewing individual property listings to understand the usable living space accurately.

faqs.question: What are the common maintenance charges for a 2 BHK apartment in this area
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges in Dayal Bagh Colony societies typically cover expenses such as common area electricity, water supply charges, lift maintenance, security services, garbage disposal, and upkeep of parks and communal amenities. These charges generally range from INR 1500 to INR 3000 per month, varying greatly depending on the size of the complex and the luxury level of the facilities provided. Always verify the current maintenance structure with the society management before finalizing the purchase.
